thread.title: Thousands protest across Brazil after councilwoman shot dead

title: Thousands protest across Brazil after councilwoman shot dead
text:
Thousands protest across Brazil after councilwoman shot dead Friday, March 16, 2018 - 01:37 
Thousands took to the streets of Brazil’s largest cities on Thursday night to protest the execution-style murder of a popular Rio de Janeiro city councilwoman, an outspoken critic of police killings of poor residents.   
Thousands took to the streets of Brazil’s largest cities on Thursday night to protest the execution-style murder of a popular Rio de Janeiro city councilwoman, an outspoken critic of police killings of poor residents.  //reut.rs/2ItPmNq
